titleStmt.title: Bull-Feather Hall, or, The Antiquity and dignity of horns, amply shown as also a description of the manners, rites, customs, and revenues belonging to that ingenious and numerous Society of Bull-Feathers Hall : together with an exact relation of their manner of going to Highgate with trumpets and horn-musick, and their pioneers intended for the levying of the hill.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Society of Bull-Feathers Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
